SENT.plain: A patient is presented with a right central retinal artery occlusion and subjective bruit over right ear
Digital compression of the right temporal artery eliminated the bruit and release reproduced the bruit
Carotid arteriogram showed bilateral internal carotid occlusion with a prominent right temporal artery
This sign reflects compensatory hyper-perfusion of the external carotid artery due to occlusion of ipsilateral internal carotid artery
